title: Creating a reading list of articles on methods for modeling semantic change involves identifying key papers and recent advancements in the field. Here’s a list of influential and recent articles up to 2024 that you might find useful

title: These articles cover a range of methodologies and approaches to modeling semantic change, including diachronic word embeddings, contextualized word representations, and dynamic topic modeling. They also address challenges and evaluation methods in the field
